events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy employs specialized solution reagents to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy employs specialized solution reagents to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
